text: Otarir ivariaba zurara biziba isi moghɨn, afeziam uan biziba abigh 3plan pozibav kɨnigh, egh pozir pumuning isɨ guizɨn otarir ivariam danɨngigh. Guizbangɨra, otarir ivariar kamɨn amebam, an pam deragha a gifongezir puvatɨ, ezɨ otarir kam, kar gumazir kamɨn faraghavɨram otozir otarim. Kamaghɨn, an otarir ivariamɨn mɨn afeziamɨn biziba iniam.”
